isDeleted.description: Flag which marks the entry as removed.

numberOfPermissions.description: Number of permissions assigned to this permission group

permissionGroupId.description: ID of the permission group (this field is required for PUT/PATCH requests)

permissions.description: Array of permissions that belong to this psermission group (for POST/PUT/PATCH requests this should be an array of permission IDs)

numberOfUsers.description: Number of users assigned to this permission group

createdDate.description: Date when the object was created.

modifiedDate.description: Date when the object was last modified.

description.example: Permissions related to user management (view, edit, create, delete etc.)
